protein.general_function: Involved in G-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
protein.specific_function: Receptor for platelet activating factor, a chemotactic phospholipid mediator that possesses potent inflammatory, smooth- muscle contractile and hypotensive activity. Seems to mediate its action via a G protein that activates a phosphatidylinositol- calcium second messenger system

go_class.description: cell surface receptor linked signaling pathway
g-protein coupled receptor protein signaling pathway
